3. Venice: Cruise in Venice Lagoon


# Venice: Cruise in Venice Lagoon

3.5

·

Good

2 reviews

![a person on a boat in the water in front of a building](https://r-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065451.webp?k=450a0f37205c1745342531b28b6a9d5bce2e80f9dcad78d4450fde21071a4f51&o=)![a man and a woman on a boat in the water](https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065463.webp?k=b8f355e5d7e137e637bbcd6432670b38a675a9954d0e8bb3461f9be11c3f2fdf&o=)![a boat in the water in front of buildings](https://r-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065477.webp?k=8767b43986d766e6585d1d40111f07dda8d3078c8687f6cb7438825292c3f0b2&o=)![a woman standing next to a man on a boat](https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065492.webp?k=849a6102570116caef36b78b838dac6c16da980faf0a5b9262cd6d7dcd9db568&o=)![a group of people sitting on a boat on the water](https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065506.webp?k=28ec7782bb600a0ccb8a343a568de953653b709073c436fe87cfa1ffd1965c25&o=)![a boat in the water next to a dock](https://r-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065517.webp?k=600eb76f88d4add3f354764e938b02603e619c916ba55650936c2b8e0c0ab322&o=)![a woman is riding a boat in the water](https://q-xx.bstatic.com/xdata/images/xphoto/max1200/189065527.webp?k=5d74331bde9c964cf2476f9b80871d41212e682f3d0234c55a4f66fc50f0ca37&o=)

Show all photos

Free cancellation available

Up to 24 hours before the start time

Duration: 3 hours

We will travel in the heart of the northern lagoon overlooking the beautiful landscape and landmarks of this part of Venice. The guests will have the chance to experience this journey on the comfort of a luxurious boat learning how Venetian navigate within the lagoon's canal, following the hidden signs and their expertise, traveling around the lagoon discovering small private islands, natural landscapes and hidden islands which can not be reached from any public transport system. They have the chance to visit place that are not accessible to the mass tourists, and experience the real Venetian water lifestyle and learn how they use to move within this natural beauty.

## What's included

- Private transportation
- chips / giambonetti chips
- WiFi on board
- Bottled water
- Restroom on board

## What's Not Included

What's not included

- Alcoholic Beverages

### Additional information

Infants are required to sit on an adult’s lap

Public transportation options are available nearby

Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller

Suitable for all physical fitness levels

On certain dates, most travelers staying outside of Venice who are planning to visit for the day will be required to pay a €5 access fee. For further details (including exemptions) and to learn what days this fee is applicable, please visit: https://cda.ve.it

### Departure point

Consorzio Cantieristica Minore Veneziana, C, Sestiere Giudecca 212, Venezia, 30133

Meet Inside the Marina at Consorzio Cantieristica Minore Veneziana.
• Arriving from Redentore waterbus station, turn right and walk along the fondmenta for 100meters until you see a Gate with a black gondola inside. Walk through the gate untill the end on the Marina. The boat name is Amore IV.

### End point

Consorzio Cantieristica Minore Veneziana, C, Sestiere Giudecca 212, Venezia, 30133

### Frequently asked questions

#### How do I book a ticket?

- Select a date and time.

- Choose the number of tickets.

- Click to the next page and enter your personal details.

- After entering your personal details, select your payment method and enter your payment details.

- Once you’ve entered your payment details, you’ll be redirected to the ticket page where you can check the status and details of your reservations.

- You'll receive a confirmation email once the reservation is confirmed with the attraction operator. This could take some time depending on the supplier.

- You can view your tickets in the confirmation email or in the Bookings & Trips section of your account.


* * *

#### When do I pay?

Booking.com collects payment on behalf of the attraction operator when you book your ticket.

* * *

#### How do digital tickets work?

Each digital ticket contains a unique code. This is usually a QR or numerical code, but could be something else and can be found on your ticket or the PDF sent to you.

If your digital ticket contains a barcode or QR code, show it to the staff at the attraction's entrance or ticket collection point for them to scan.

For those with numerical codes, show your ticket to staff for verification.

* * *

#### Can I cancel or modify my tickets?

You’ll need to check the policy on the specific ticket you book. Last-minute bookings might not have free cancellation available.

* * *

#### When will I get my free cancellation refund?

After you cancel, we'll issue a full refund immediately. Depending on your bank or payment provider, it can take 3–10 days to be refunded to your original payment method.

metadata.description: Find out about Venice: Cruise in Venice Lagoon like tour times and location. Book tickets online with free cancellation and skip-the-line access!
metadata.title: Venice: Cruise in Venice Lagoon Venice – Booking.com

Why visit: Experience the hidden landscapes and private islands of the Venetian lagoon
Learn about the local navigation techniques and water lifestyle
Enjoy scenic views away from tourist crowds
Restrictions: Infants are required to sit on an adult’s lap
Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller
Suitable for all physical fitness levels
€5 access fee for some travelers on certain dates
Location: Consorzio Cantieristica Minore Veneziana, C, Sestiere Giudecca 212, Venezia, 30133
additional Information: Free cancellation available up to 24 hours before the start time
Tour available in English and Italian
Booking can be done via the specified URL for tickets.
